name: Eggsteroid Tower Deluxe
description:
Eggsteroid Tower Deluxe Description

Eggsteroid Tower Deluxe is probably the most "cliche" video game name you ever heard... But it's free!

Synopsis

The world is going mad, eggs has mutated into eggsteroids, falling from the sky and threatening your tower! You are poor, no money for weapons, you'll have to use your tower bricks to defend it!

Controls Move Grab/Throw Drop
